Name: Barranquilla Green Jade
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & mint sprig.
Review: Lime green in colour, a tad minty and creamy smooth.
Nutrition: One serving of Barranquilla Green Jade contains 259 calories
